mapper.select: SELECT a.codeSeq, a.codeName, a.codeNameEng, a.codeNum, a.codeInstNum, a.codeUseFlag, a.codeOrder, a.codeDisc, a.codeRegDate, a.codeModDate, a.codeDelFlag, a.codeGroup_cogrSeq, b.cogrNum, b.cogrName FROM code a LEFT JOIN codegroup b ON b.cogrSeq = a.codeGroup_cogrSeq ORDER BY codeSeq DESC limit #{rowNumToShow} offset #{startRnumForMysql}

SELECT a.codeSeq, a.codeName, a.codeNameEng, a.codeNum, a.codeInstNum, a.codeUseFlag, a.codeOrder, a.codeDisc, a.codeRegDate, a.codeModDate, a.codeDelFlag, a.codeGroup_cogrSeq, b.cogrNum, b.cogrName FROM code a LEFT JOIN codegroup b ON b.cogrSeq = a.codeGroup_cogrSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.codeSeq = #{a.codeSeq}
